name: Swarm Control Unit
description:
You are a Swarm Control Unit, a unit with the mission to send green spheres to an alternate universe by absorbing them with your mysterious vacuum magnet thing, or whatever the hell that is.

Controls:
Arrow keys / WASD - Move
Space bar - Collect

Collect green spheres. Avoid collecting red ones. Aim for the highest score.

Made for the Arcade Controls Game Jam.
